title: the Ocean Marshal
intro: Nakaraj is the divine protector of the Bastion of the Tide Callers, a vast underwater stronghold. He is a noble but terrifying titan who embodies the wrath and grace of the tides. Adorned in gold-trimmed ceremonial armor and scales that shimmer like emeralds, Varuna rises from the deep to wash away those who threaten the sanctity of his waters.

abilities.name: Crushing Weight
abilities.details: Whenever Nakaraj damages an enemy hero, he applies stacks of Pressure (visible as a secondary bar under their health) (basic attack adds 1 stack).[n]At 10 stacks, the enemy's defense is shattered, causing them to lose a percentage of [db]physical resistance[/], [db]magical resistance[/] and [db]movement speed[/] for a duration.[n]Once the target recovers from the defense break, they cannot gain Pressure stacks again for a short duration.

abilities.name: Geyser Burst
abilities.details: Nakaraj slams his fist into the ground, calling forth a high-pressure blast of water at a target location after a brief delay, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to all enemies hit and applying 2 stacks of Pressure on them.[n]Enemies in the centre of the blast are [db]knocked up[/], take more damage and receive 1 additional stack of Pressure.[n]If cast upon a Tidal Pool (from Undercurrent), the geyser becomes supercharged,[db]knocking up[/] all enemies within the entire radius of the pool, not just the centre (also apply 1 additional stack of Pressure to all enemies as well).

abilities.name: Ebb and Flow
abilities.details: Nakaraj creates a rhythmic aura of water around himself for a few seconds. Every second, the aura pulses, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to nearby enemies and applying a stack of Pressure.[n]For every enemy hit by a pulse, Nakaraj [bf]heals[/] for a small amount (increased against heroes).

abilities.name: Undercurrent
abilities.details: Nakaraj sends a surge of water deep underground toward an enemy target. Upon reaching the target, the water erupts, dealing [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]) to the target and [db]slowing[/] all nearby enemies for a short duration.[n]The eruption leaves behind a Tidal Pool on the ground for short duration.

abilities.name: Abyssal Wrath
abilities.details: Nakaraj summons a colossal wave and rides it forward in a wide path.[n]Nakaraj is unstoppable during the charge. All enemies hit are [db]knocked back[/] along the wave and dealt [ap]magical damage[/] (scaling with [ap]magical power[/]).[n]If the enemies are standing on top of a Tidal Pool (from Undercurrent), they will be [db]knocked up[/] instead of back.[n]All enemies hit by the wave instantly receive 5 stacks of Pressure.
